title: Infinix Hot S Quick Review
description: Ingat GADGET, ingat DROIDLIME...!Spesifikasi Infinix Hot S:Harga: Rp1.749.000 (versi 2 GB)CPU: 8-core MediaTek MT6753 1,3 GHzGPU: Mali-T720RAM: 2/3 GBStorage: 16/32 GBOS: Android 6.0.1Kamera: 13 MP & 8 MP Layar: IPS 5,2 inci (1.280 x 720 piksel)Baterai: 3.000 mAhSensor: Accelerometer, proximity, fingerprint, gyroscope (software)USB OTG: YaScreen-on-time: 3,5 jamAnTuTu Benchmark: 37 ribu poinJangan lupa download Apps Android DroidLime agar lebih mudah mendapatkan update dari kami:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.droidlime.appsTalent: Imelda LianziDevice tested by: DroidLime (Romi Hidayat)Lokasi: Suwe Ora JamuFB: DroidLime https://www.facebook.com/droidlimeTwitter: @droidlime https://twitter.com/droidlimeGPlus: DroidLime https://plus.google.com/+DroidlimeInstagram: https://instagram.com/droidlime/LINE@: @droidlime
